Quoting raju99 <theindiandude@...>:

> Hi,
> 
> I am trying to answer the following question for myself -
> "What is the best approach for testing get/set methods ?"

One answer: do not test what cannot possibly break. If you really want a get() 
and set() method, and most of the time they're built for no good reason, then 
just code them. Unless they're doing something more than answering the value of 
a field, they can't break.
